raw: * The background class contains methods to compute and set the background image
* of a DOM element.
* It fixes a background position issue in Firefox 2.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The background class contains methods to compute and set the background image of a DOM element. It fixes a background position issue in Firefox 2.

raw: * @type {Array} Internal helper to improve compile performance

@type.name: @type
@type.body: {Array} Internal helper to improve compile performance

raw: * @type {Map} Empty styles when no image is given

@type.name: @type
@type.body: {Map} Empty styles when no image is given

raw: * Computes the background position CSS value
* @param left {Integer|String} either an integer pixel value or a CSS
*    string value
* @param top {Integer|String} either an integer pixel value or a CSS
*    string value
* @return {String} The background position CSS value

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
left {Integer|String} either an integer pixel value or a CSS
    string value
@param.description:
either an integer pixel value or a CSS
    string value

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
top {Integer|String} either an integer pixel value or a CSS
    string value
@param.description:
either an integer pixel value or a CSS
    string value

raw: * Compiles the background into a CSS compatible string.
* @param source {String?null} The URL of the background image
* @param repeat {String?null} The background repeat property. valid values
* are repeat, repeat-x,
* repeat-y, no-repeat
* @param left {Integer|String?null} The horizontal offset of the image
*      inside of the image element. If the value is an integer it is
*      interpreted as pixel value otherwise the value is taken as CSS value.
*      CSS the values are "center", "left" and "right"
* @param top {Integer|String?null} The vertical offset of the image
*      inside of the image element. If the value is an integer it is
*      interpreted as pixel value otherwise the value is taken as CSS value.
*      CSS the values are "top", "bottom" and "center"
* @return {String} CSS string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Compiles the background into a CSS compatible string.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: source {String?null} The URL of the background image
@param.description: The URL of the background image

@param.name: @param
@param.body: repeat {String?null} The background repeat property. valid values are repeat, repeat-x, repeat-y, no-repeat
@param.description: The background repeat property. valid values are repeat, repeat-x, repeat-y, no-repeat

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
left {Integer|String?null} The horizontal offset of the image
      inside of the image element. If the value is an integer it is
      interpreted as pixel value otherwise the value is taken as CSS value.
      CSS the values are "center", "left" and "right"
@param.description:
The horizontal offset of the image
      inside of the image element. If the value is an integer it is
      interpreted as pixel value otherwise the value is taken as CSS value.
      CSS the values are "center", "left" and "right"

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
top {Integer|String?null} The vertical offset of the image
      inside of the image element. If the value is an integer it is
      interpreted as pixel value otherwise the value is taken as CSS value.
      CSS the values are "top", "bottom" and "center"
@param.description:
The vertical offset of the image
      inside of the image element. If the value is an integer it is
      interpreted as pixel value otherwise the value is taken as CSS value.
      CSS the values are "top", "bottom" and "center"

raw: * Get standard css background styles
* @param source {String} The URL of the background image
* @param repeat {String?null} The background repeat property. valid values
* are repeat, repeat-x,
* repeat-y, no-repeat
* @param left {Integer|String?null} The horizontal offset of the image
*      inside of the image element. If the value is an integer it is
*      interpreted as pixel value otherwise the value is taken as CSS value.
*      CSS the values are "center", "left" and "right"
* @param top {Integer|String?null} The vertical offset of the image
*      inside of the image element. If the value is an integer it is
*      interpreted as pixel value otherwise the value is taken as CSS value.
*      CSS the values are "top", "bottom" and "center"
* @return {Map} A map of CSS styles

@param.name: @param

@param.description: The URL of the background image

      interpreted as pixel value otherwise the value is taken as CSS value.
      CSS the values are "center", "left" and "right"
@param.description:
The horizontal offset of the image
      inside of the image element. If the value is an integer it is
      interpreted as pixel value otherwise the value is taken as CSS value.

@param.name: @param

top {Integer|String?null} The vertical offset of the image
      inside of the image element. If the value is an integer it is
      interpreted as pixel value otherwise the value is taken as CSS value.

raw: * Set the background on the given DOM element
* @param element {Element} The element to modify
* @param source {String?null} The URL of the background image
* @param repeat {String?null} The background repeat property. valid values
* are repeat, repeat-x,
* repeat-y, no-repeat
* @param left {Integer?null} The horizontal offset of the image inside of
*     the image element.
* @param top {Integer?null} The vertical offset of the image inside of
*     the image element.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Set the background on the given DOM element

left {Integer?null} The horizontal offset of the image inside of

@param.description:
